alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 3:28PM EDT until May 03 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Central Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 328 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tallahassee Comm College, or near Tallahassee, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Midway, Tallahassee Comm College, Macon Community Park, Levy Park, Andrew, Orchard Pond, Maclay State Gardens, Gibson, Tallahassee Coml Airport, Killearn Estates, Lake Jackson, Tallahassee Mall, Forest Meadows Park and Mission San Luis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
